roleset.name: located 'around', in the general vicinity

example.name: arg1
example.text: Mr. Kelly has recovered from surgery without any complication and is up and about and asymptomatic .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8.

roleset.name: about to __

roles.note: This roleset has no roles, so don't tag any!

roleset.note: Added by Julia and Katie to accommodate quasi-adverbial/modal/future usage. Comparison to 'going to__', which is go.04.

example.name: modal-ish
example.text: John was about to start jumping up and down.
